title: The Battle of Badwater
description: Cattle rancher Crack Conrad has set his sights on a national treasure and the pride of Texas—a prized bull named Fancy Red. Little does Crack know just how complicated the journey to Bad Water will get, as competition grows fierce and rancher Raymond Tyrell has no intention of leaving Fancy Red up for grabs. The town of Bad Water, Texas quickly becomes fraught with murder, corruption, and tyrannical lawmen out to take over…Full of gunslinging action, drama, and courtroom intrigue, The Battle of Bad Water will leave you clamoring for justice and rooting for the bold, hard-working Texas town.
author: Robert Vaughan
